inlineContent.text: Apple’s visionOS natively supports USD and also uses reality(Apple’s 3D Model representation format) but there is no native solution that can convert URDFs to reality or USD. There is a tool from NVIDIA that does convert URDF to USD but it not yet tested on Apple Platforms like macOS or visionOS. As a part of the thesis, RosRealityHelper - a macOS application was developed that can convert ROS2 robot description packages to reality was created. The robot model is localized to it’s real pose with the help of fiducial markers.
The robot models are loaded automatically depending on the configuration specified by the end user using the RosRealityViewTemplate.

abstract.text: This pages documents certain insights gained while working on my master thesis - A modular framework for building AR Applications on Apple XR Devices interacting with ROS-based Robots.
